1.0.name: wordpress/appointment-booking-calendar-by-click4time
1.0.description:
Online appointment booking is an essential business tool for today's fast moving world. Click4Time is an award winning booking solution that's feature rich and easy to use for both you and your clients.

Save time and money from replying to emails and playing telephone tag. Give your clients the benefit of booking and managing their appointments online, anytime, anywhere. With online booking, over 60% book after business hours and many book after midnight - allow your calendar to be filled even while you sleep.

Click4Time is ideal for any business that books time, including massage therapists, acupuncturists, counsellors, salons, fitness trainers, spas, home services, financial planners, personal and business coaches, to name just a few.

We have a Free account for single Service Provider businesses that allows for up to 20 bookings per month. Paid plans include: * $9.95 - Single Service Provider or Resources with up to 100 bookings per month. * $19.95 - Sin
